QuestData.Title: Escape from Durnholde
QuestData.Description: I have plans for my people, stranger.$B$BOne day, they shall overthrow their oppressors and rise as one. They will break free from the bonds that hold them and from that uprising shall be born the orcish Horde.$B$BWe will leave when you are ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: When you are ready to proceed, let Thrall know. Follow Thrall out of Durnholde Keep and help him free Taretha and fulfill his destiny.$B$BSpeak with Erozion in Old Hillsbrad should you complete this task.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done a great thing, $n. Alas, the young warchief's memory of these events must be as they originally were...
